<updated>2015-03-12T19:48:39Z</updated>   <link href="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/StudyWithUs/studywhatyoulove/whatemployerswant/whatemployerswant.aspx?SyndicationType=2" rel="self" type="application/atom+xml" />   <entry>     <title>Imogen O'Mahoney, PwC</title>     <link href="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/studywithus/studywhatyoulove/whatemployerswant/pwc.aspx" />     <author>       <name>Jessica Lloyd</name>     </author>     <summary>Don't undersell yourself- take stock of all the things you have done over the past few years, from academic achievements to personal developments and be prepared to talk in detail about them to showcase your ability.</summary>     <published>2012-10-26T11:03:00Z</published>     <updated>2012-10-30T16:03:00Z</updated>     <media:thumbnail url="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk%2fStudywithus%2fImages%2fPwCthumbnail.jpg" />     <id>http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/studywithus/studywhatyoulove/whatemployerswant/pwc.aspx</id>   </entry>   <entry>     <title>Amy Hoskins, Norton Rose LLP</title>     <link href="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/studywithus/studywhatyoulove/whatemployerswant/nortonrosellp.aspx" />     <author>       <name>Jessica Lloyd</name>     </author>     <summary>We look for those who take part in a range of extracurricular activities, demonstrating competencies such as leadership (through a role of responsibility eg society secretary), teamwork (eg through the Duke of Edinburgh Award) and resilience.</summary>     <published>2012-10-26T10:27:00Z</published>     <updated>2012-10-30T16:05:00Z</updated>     <media:thumbnail url="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk%2fStudywithus%2fImages%2fnortonrosethumbnail.jpg" />     <id>http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/studywithus/studywhatyoulove/whatemployerswant/nortonrosellp.aspx</id>   </entry>   <entry>     <title>Tim Smith, Berwin Leighton Paisner LLP</title>     <link href="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/studywithus/studywhatyoulove/whatemployerswant/berwinleightonpaisnerllp.aspx" />     <author>       <name>Jessica Lloyd</name>     </author>     <summary>As a Nottingham student you have access to a great careers service. Take full advantage of the advice the careers officers can give you and the many resources that are available to help you make an informed decision.</summary>     <published>2012-10-26T10:27:00Z</published>     <updated>2012-11-01T09:16:00Z</updated>     <media:thumbnail url="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk%2fStudywithus%2fStudyWhatYouLove%2fImages%2flogo-berwinleighton-Cropped-100x100.png" />     <id>http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/studywithus/studywhatyoulove/whatemployerswant/berwinleightonpaisnerllp.aspx</id>   </entry>   <entry>     <title>Sepha Brook, L'Or\ufffd\ufffdal</title>     <link href="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/studywithus/studywhatyoulove/whatemployerswant/loreal.aspx" />     <author>       <name>Jessica Lloyd</name>     </author>     <summary>We are interested in students from all academic fields of study. We hire graduates who have acquired skills attainable through effective study of any discipline. This includes tenacity, self-motivation, organisation, lateral thinking and open mindedness.</summary>     <published>2012-10-26T10:25:00Z</published>     <updated>2012-10-30T16:00:00Z</updated>     <media:thumbnail url="http://www.nottingham.ac.uk%2fStudywithus%2fImages%2florealthumbnail.jpg" />     <id>http://www.nottingham.ac.uk/studywithus/studywhatyoulove/whatemployerswant/loreal.aspx</id>   </entry> </feed>
